thread.title: Gene Crites
thread.title_full: Pool Supplies Superstore reviewed by Gene Crites

author: Gene Crites
title: Gene Crites
text: I ordered a new pool pump for above ground application because I was not familiar with the terms. Reading the information when the pump arrived I realized I had made a mistake and requested that I be allowed to return it. I had to pay the return shipping charges $45 but it was better than losing the whole $117.68 I had paid for the unit. I was treated courteous and friendly by your staff and was advised to return the unit immediately to avoid any further charges. I did so and the cost was credited to my Master Card the next day after it was received. I am very confident now that I am dealing with a reputable pool supply source and will not hesitate to do business with them again in the future. As for the pump that is working right now I fixed my problem by lubricating the motor bearing. That may be a short term fix but if I need to buy a new one, now I know where to go for sure.
